channel.title: Can anyone help me
channel.description: Like how do i change the xp on server. I seen a tut like that but with mass delete it got deleted.Now i was searching but dint found it . Woul'd someone be so nice and post in code how i find the changing xp part.Thank you. :)

item.title: Can anyone help me
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

If you have a server where you hit hay and so on, look for things like this:

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You gain attack experience!"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((1200*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((600*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 10; } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help me
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Find the places where XP is gained and change the ammount.

For example, where you would see

animation = somenumber
server.playerHandler[attackingon].hitDiff = stuff;
addSkillXP(3, 4 * hitdiff);

That is basically saying this player is doing an animation, and a player nearby is taking damage. Basicallly, the first one is attacking the second one.

the last part - addSkillXP(int ,int) is where the XP is gained.

Note though - it may be different, like addStatXP or increaseLevel, but thats the general pattern it follows.

Read full topic
